text:
men in tech generally don't give much thought to how we look. women sadly do not have that privilege.

the golden rule is don't tell women what to wear, and definitely DONT FUCKING USE THE WORDS HOT OR NOT IN A YOUTUBE COMMENT ON A TECH TALK. https://t.co/SjWKk8aBbw

author.name: Arya Fureal also @monkchips@mastodon.social
author.description: redmonk co-founder, sunshine in a bag, industry analyst loves developers, "motivating in a surreal kind of way". came up with "progressive delivery". he/him
